sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { variables } from './Variables.js'; export class Machine extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { machines: [], modalTitle:"", MachineId:0, MachineName:"", MachineClass:"", MachineCompany:"", MachineState:"" } } refreshList() { fetch(variables.API_URL + 'machine') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { this.setState({ machines: data }); }); } componentDidMount() { this.refreshList(); } changeMachineName = (e)=>{ this.setState({MachineName:e.target.value}); } render() { const { machines, modalTitle, MachineId, MachineName, MachineClass, MachineCompany, MachineState } = this.state; return (
{machines.map(machin => )}
MachineId MachineName MachineClass MachineCompany
{machin.MachineId} {machin.MachineName} {machin.MachineClass} {machin.MachineCompany}
{modalTitle}
MachineName
{MachineId==0? :null} {MachineId!=0? :null}
) } }
